tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE payment_status_updates(
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
    status_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE successful_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE failed_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    reason TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE pending_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    success BOOLEAN
);
